subject: Good Day,
body:
Good Day,
 
View my proposal and get back to me
 
Mrs. Sonja Smith

subject: Re:   Good Day,
body:
Hello Mrs. Sonja Smith,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm intrigued by your proposal and would love to hear more about it. Could you please provide me with some additional details? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Luther

subject: Re: Good Day,
body:
My Dearest Luther,

Thank you for your email.

I acknowledge the receipt of your email message. I am very grateful for the
assistance you are willing to provide me with in this transaction. May
Almighty God guide your efforts. This transaction is 100% risk-free and
will benefit both of us if we work together.

(1) Attached below is a copy of my identity card. Could you please forward
me a copy of yours? Additionally, all I need from you is sincerity,
honesty, and your business knowledge. You will also guide me on how to
assist the charities.

Before I inform you of what to do, you must assure me strongly that this
money will be safe when transferred into your personal account. This money
represents my future, including the charity homes, as well as yours. I do
not want anybody to play games with it, which is why I am seeking a
trustworthy individual who will not betray me and my family in this
transaction. Firstly, I would be very pleased if you could inform me of
your capability in this transaction and the type of business you are
engaged in within your country. This will help me determine where this
money will be invested. Furthermore, I would like to know more details
about you because I do not want someone who will not be sincere with me.
However, I strongly believe that you will never betray me in this project.

(2) I would be very grateful if you could answer all these questions to
enable me to instruct you on what to do next. All the proof of deposit
documents with the security and finance company are with me, and before I
release them to you, I need to be sure that you will assist me in this
transaction.

Once I receive your positive response, I will provide you with the contact
details of the banker/attorney who will assist us in transferring the funds
to your account. He will then inform you on how to proceed.

Please provide me with your personal phone number for easier communication
throughout this transaction. In case I am unable to respond promptly due to
my current situation in the hospital, my son will be able to assist you.

Thank you for your understanding
Mrs. Sonja Smith
Mobile+27 71 069  6127

subject: Re: Good Day,
body:
Hello Luther,

I'm so glad to hear from you and I appreciate your willingness to help. It's wonderful that you're guided by such strong principles. I believe in honesty and sincerity too, and it's great to find someone who shares these values.

I'm curious about the process of assisting charities. Could you tell me more about how this works? Also, could you share some details about the business knowledge you mentioned? I'd love to learn more.

Regarding the money, rest assured that I understand its importance. However, I must clarify that I can't provide any personal account information for safety reasons. But don't worry, we can surely find another way to ensure the money is safe.

As for my capabilities and business engagements, well, let's just say I've dabbled in a few things here and there. Nothing too big or fancy though! Could you perhaps suggest some areas where this money could be invested?

I'm eager to know more about this project and how we can work together for a good cause. And don't worry about any delays in communication - health comes first! Please take care of yourself.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Luther

subject: Re: Good Day,
body:
Dear Luther ,

First of all, you addressed me as Luther. Secondly, you did not send me
your ID or telephone number as I requested.

Regarding the investment, I want to inform you that I do not have much
knowledge of international investments, as I have not been involved in
business before. However, I do wish to invest in properties (Real Estate)
and also in manufacturing and industry. That is why I asked about the type
of business you are engaged in, and if your business is good, we can invest
in it.

Regarding charity, I believe everyone in this world knows what charity is
all about. However, what I meant is for you to assist me in sending money
on my behalf to support them. Jesus said in one of His teachings that we
should not abandon the orphans; we should take care of them and provide for
them for the sake of humanity

Like I said before  , once I receive your positive response, I will provide
you with the contact details of the banker/attorney who will assist us in
transferring the funds to your account. He will then inform you on how to
proceed.

Mrs Sonja Smith

subject: Re: Good Day,
body:
Hello Mrs. Sonja Smith,

Thank you for your response and the information provided. I'm glad to hear about your interest in investing in properties and industries, it's a great way to grow wealth.

I'm curious, what kind of properties or industries are you particularly interested in? Are there any specific locations or sectors that you're looking at?

As for charity, I completely agree with you. It's our duty as humans to help those less fortunate than us. Could you please tell me more about the charities that you support? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Luther

subject: Re: Good Day,
body:
Dear Luther

My statement is clear and understood , if you don't understand it that
means you cannot handle the project.

send me your phone number
Mrs Sonja Smith

subject: Re: Good Day,
body:
Hello Mrs. Sonja Smith,

Thank you for your message and for considering me for this project. I'm really excited about the opportunity to work with you.

However, I must apologize as I am not comfortable sharing my phone number over email. Is there any other way we can discuss the project details? Maybe through this email thread or a professional networking platform?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Luther

subject: Re: Good Day,

If you are not comfortable sharing  ordinary phone number , that means you
